content:
In my view, I believe that this game is excellent for any South Park fan. It took me 13 hours to finish the story, yet I still need to complete all the achievements.
Despite being released in 2014, it still stands strong in terms of content.
summary:

title: Game Review | South Park - The Stick of Truth
